DOC.brief_summary: To assess safety tolerability , characterize dose-limiting toxicity , identify maximum tolerate dose BMS-986016 alone combination Nivolumab subject select advanced ( metastatic and/or unresectable ) solid tumor provide preliminary information clinical benefit combination .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Study Anti-LAG-3 With Without Anti-PD-1 Treatment Solid Tumors
DOC.criteria: For information regard BMS clinical trial participation , please visit www.BMSStudyConnect.com . For Dose escalation : subject cervical , ovarian , bladder CRC , head neck , gastric hepatocellular cancer naive immunooncology agent ; 1st line melanoma 1st line/2nd line NSCLC ; Renal Cell Carcinoma naive IO ; NSCLC progress therapy antiPD1/antiPDL1 melanoma subject progress whileon treatment antiPD1 antiPDL1 without antiCTLA4 .
